doc.field: Anne Filardo Papers on Rank and File Activism in the American Federation of Teachers and in the United Federation of Teachers
Anne Filardo Papers on Rank and File Activism in the American Federation of Teachers and in the United Federation of Teachers

UAC, AFT and AFT: -Conventions in San Francisco (1971); St. Paul (1972); Washington, D.C. (1973); Toronto, including Coalition for a Democratic Union (1974); Honolulu (1975); and Boston (1977) -Writings on Carnegie Report
New York State United Teachers (NYSUT): -GrassRoots Caucus and Conventions in Montreal (1973) and NYC (1976) -Teacher Democracy Files (1973-1976)
National Education Association (NEA): -Conventions in Portland (1973) and Chicago (1974)
Anne Filardo Papers on Rank and File Activism in the American Federation of Teachers and in the United Federation of Teachers
